name: Understanding Audiences in the Digital Age
description: Understanding the interests and goals of audiences is a key part of media production. This course introduces communication research methods including ratings, metrics, in-depth interviews, and focus groups. The focus of class discussion and research project is to use these methods to be able to understand the nature of audiencesâ€™ media use in the digital age. Same as JOUC80H3
